duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist Nurse Manager/ Clinical Coordinator and/or Charge Nurse in the effective and efficient functioning of the nursing unit, including coordination of information, unit organization, and communication with other departments and physicians.
Check unit inventories, storeroom, and other supplies and place orders as indicated by the Nurse Manager.
Welcome all newly admitted patients and orient them to their room and patient engagement system.
Ensure charts are completed; content is in proper sequence and placed in appropriate areas for Health Information Services pick-up upon patient discharge or when chart is thinned.
Answer telephone; take and relay messages; provide information as appropriate.
Respond to the patient call bell system and immediately refer to RN or PCT. Follow up as necessary.
Coordinate patient transport to and from.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate or equivalent, with one year of continued education.
